title: Xavier Project
subtitle:
Did you know that you can shop on #Amazon and support Xavier Project at the same time? By going to http://smile.amazon.com  you will get access to all Amazon products, prices and features and the AmazonSmile will pay us 0.5% of your purchase! 

It's that simple. 
#Refugees #smilespic.twitter.com/c6mVGtt2NN

title: Rebecca Deng
subtitle: Those listening to audiobook,I hope you are enjoying the voice of a true African princess, Tsidii Le Loka. She is Rafiki, the lead voice on the Circle of Life in the Grammy Award winning performance of The Lion King on Broadway #WhatTheyMeantforEvil #LostGirl #refugees #USApic.twitter.com/S0LPprxfSI

title: TEDxUbud
subtitle: 4 years ago, Abdullah Sarwari and his family came to Indonesia to seek safety as #refugees. As refugees, they were not allowed to work or study in Indonesia. He and 4 friends co-founded the Refugee Learning Center, providing free education to over 300 refugees in Indonesia. #tedxpic.twitter.com/mGLD5TZDuQ

title: Museum Ian
subtitle:

title: Diana
subtitle: Several Generals & NGOs are asking @POTUS to increase the number of #Refugees to 95k. If you like him to reduce this number to below the 30k ceiling then please RT or better yet contact him & your reps & go to @NumbersUSA to learn more. Thank youpic.twitter.com/WcJdKSxRov

title: Diana
subtitle:
To screen #Refugees for #Ebola is to test specifically for it. And as you'll learn from the Florida Marque the Ebola virus has changed. Now you're sick with cold flu like symptoms for about 2 weeks before getting really sick! 
Lastly, the info I've shown in my pics, like this onepic.twitter.com/OYtb5yJsGm
